shlifovkaMetaluPage.title: Metal Grinding
shlifovkaMetaluPage.description: Metal grinding is one of the key areas of activity for QPart. We provide metalworking services throughout Ukraine, taking on complex tasks and adhering to the highest quality standards. If you need metal grinding services in Dnipro, our company will deliver them at the highest level and in the shortest time.
shlifovkaMetaluPage.peculiaritiesTitle: We use a wide range of grinding methods, including:

listPeculiarities.description: External cylindrical grinding: used for processing large parts with high precision.
Internal grinding: improves the quality of internal surfaces of parts, such as bearings or hydraulic components.
Gear grinding: for processing gear wheels used in various mechanisms.
Centerless grinding: effective for processing external and internal surfaces of parts.
Surface grinding: for achieving a perfectly smooth surface on flat and shaped surfaces.

listServices.description: Metal grinding is the final stage of processing metal products, allowing for achieving a perfectly smooth surface. This procedure is typically performed after turning or milling operations to eliminate imperfections and ensure high precision of manufactured parts.

shlifovkaMetaluPage.callToActionTop: Smoothness and precision of every surface.

termichnaObrobkaPage.title: HEAT TREATMENT
termichnaObrobkaPage.description: Heat treatment of metal by QPart: quenching, annealing, and tempering.This is a key stage in production that significantly improves the quality and performance characteristics of materials.
termichnaObrobkaPage.peculiaritiesTitle: From hardening to annealing, these technologies ensure:

listPeculiarities.description: Enhancing strength and resistance to mechanical stress;
Improving corrosion resistance;
Withstanding high-temperature exposure;
Flexibility and reduction of internal stresses in the metal structure.

listServices.description: Metal hardening.
Annealing of steel and other metals - This process involves slow cooling after heating, which reduces hardness, eliminates internal stresses, and improves the metal structure.
Metal tempering - The final stage of heat treatment, providing a balance between hardness and flexibility, crucial for improving operational performance.

termichnaObrobkaPage.callToActionTop: Optimize the strength and durability of your parts.

frezerniRoboty.title: CNC Milling by QPart: Precision, Quality, Professionalism
frezerniRoboty.description: CNC milling is a modern method of metal machining that allows the production of parts with complex geometric parameters and high operational characteristics. This technology is applicable for working with various materials: titanium, aluminum, cast iron, stainless steel, and other metals.

listPeculiarities.description: The use of high-precision milling machines with numerical control ensures maximum accuracy and minimal human factor influence.
The technology is suitable for both rough and finishing operations, allowing for the achievement of perfect surface quality on the parts.
Disc, end, and face mills are used depending on the complexity of the order and the material characteristics.

listServices.description: Up milling: The cutter moves against the workpiece, offering high reliability but lower precision. Ideal for rough machining.
Down milling: The cutter and workpiece move in the same direction, enabling maximum precision during finish machining.
Feed per revolution (mm/rev): Movement of the cutter per one revolution.
Feed rate per minute (rev/min): Tool movement in one minute.
Per tooth (mm/tooth): Distance covered by the cutter per one tooth rotation.

frezerniRoboty.callToAction: Trust us with CNC milling work — we guarantee precision and fast execution of your tasks!

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.title: CNC Turning: Precision, Quality, Reliability
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.description: CNC turning is a modern metal machining technology that allows the production of parts with high precision and specified parameters. This method is ideal for creating both simple and complex products made from stainless steel, aluminum, brass, cast iron, and other materials.

listPeculiarities.description: Precision and stability. CNC machines provide processing with minimal deviations from the specified dimensions.
Execution speed. Due to process automation, high productivity is achieved even with large volumes of work.
Flexibility in working with materials. The technology is suitable for processing hard alloys, stainless steel, aluminum, and other metals.
Surface quality. Thanks to precise cutting tools, finished products have a smooth, neat surface that meets the specified roughness.

listServices.description: Allowance. Before starting work, the thickness of the material layer to be removed to achieve the specified dimensions is determined.
CNC processing. The process uses computer numerical control, which eliminates errors caused by human factors.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.callToActionTop: Order high-precision CNC turning services today.
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.callToActionBottom: We guarantee the perfect quality of every part!

porizkaNaVerstati.title: Cutting on a Bandsaw: Efficiency and Precision
porizkaNaVerstati.description: Cutting on a bandsaw is a modern and reliable method of material processing that ensures high quality and precision of finished parts. Thanks to advanced technologies, this method is optimal for producing parts of any complexity.

listPeculiarities.description: Cutting accuracy up to 1 mm: Perfect match to the specified dimensions without deviations.
Clean and neat cut: No burnt edges, chips, or other defects.
Minimal cutting thickness: Economical material usage with minimal waste.
Flexibility in choosing cutting angles: Ability to cut at 30°, 45°, 60°, or 90° angles for various needs.
Ready-made 'assembly' parts: Elements ready for further assembly or use.

listServices.description: Band saw cutting ensures speed, quality, and precision in fulfilling any order. This solution is ideal for both individual projects and mass production.

porizkaNaVerstati.callToActionTop: Precise metal cutting with no extra costs.
porizkaNaVerstati.callToActionBottom: Submit your request for our services today!

indyvidualniZamovlennya.title: Custom Metal Products: Quality and Timeliness
indyvidualniZamovlennya.description: Manufacturing metal products is a modern approach to meeting the needs for parts of any complexity. This service allows the client to avoid costs associated with purchasing equipment, training personnel, and organizing the production process. Thanks to advanced technologies, QPart manufactures custom metal products in accordance with the highest quality standards. We work with steel, aluminum, brass, cast iron, stainless steel, and other metals, ensuring precise execution of technical tasks.

listPeculiarities.description: Technical specifications. We work closely with the client to ensure that all products fully meet their requirements.
Design and calculations. The choice of material, thickness, structural elements, and manufacturing method ensures the durability and functionality of the final product.
Timely delivery. We understand the importance of on-time delivery, which is why we always adhere to agreed timelines.

indyvidualniZamovlennya.servicesTitle: QPart products are used in various industries, including:

listServices.description: Construction: Metal structures, fasteners, system elements.
Mechanical engineering: Shafts, gears, housing parts.
Aviation: Lightweight, durable components made of special alloys.
Energy: Turbine elements, pipes, casings.
Agricultural sector: Spare parts for machinery, equipment components.

indyvidualniZamovlennya.question: Need a custom solution?
indyvidualniZamovlennya.answer: We will manufacture parts according to your requirements. Contact us!

lazernaRizkaPage.title: Laser Metal Cutting
lazernaRizkaPage.description: Laser cutting is a modern method of processing and cutting sheet metal using high-precision equipment with CNC (computer numerical control). Each order is processed individually: before starting, the machine is programmed considering all technical requirements, ensuring perfect accuracy and the ability to work with materials of any complexity.

listServices.description: Laser perforation of sheet metal - ideal for creating holes of various shapes and sizes with high precision.
Laser cutting of pipes and profiles - allows for precise processing of complex-shaped metal structures.

listAdvantages.title: Capable of handling large volumes – ensuring uninterrupted work even for large-scale orders.
More than 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed of execution.
Flexible deadlines – we work quickly and always on time!

listPeculiarities.description: Ability to work with various materials: stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, and others, including non-ferrous metals.
Perfectly smooth edges without the need for additional processing.
Minimized material waste due to high precision.
No deformation of the metal, preserving its original properties.
Unlike traditional mechanical cutting methods, laser processing guarantees quality and cost-effectiveness for producing parts of any complexity.

lazernaRizkaPage.callToActionTop: Fast and precise laser cutting of metal for any task.

listOrderBenefits.title: Ready for large volumes – ensuring uninterrupted operations even for large-scale orders.
More than 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed of execution.
Flexible deadlines – we work quickly and always on time!

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.title: WELDING WORKS
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.description: Metalworking is a complex and responsible process that requires qualification and experience. At the “QPart” forge, professional welders perform all types of welding work efficiently and on time.

listServices.description: Mechanical welding – ideal for working with various metals.
Arc welding – one of the most common methods for creating reliable joints.
Manual arc welding – a versatile method for different conditions.
Laser welding – a high-precision technique for complex structures.
Plasma and spot welding – for special quality and precision requirements.
Forge welding – a traditional method used for artistic creations.

listPeculiarities.description: Professional approach: Welders with experience working with various types of metals.
Technological advancement: Use of modern methods such as MIG, TIG, and manual arc welding.
Precision: Minimizing seams and metal deformations.
Material variety: Welding of ferrous, non-ferrous metals, stainless steel, and aluminum.

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.callToActionTop: High-quality metal welding for your project.

lyttyaMetaluPage.title: METAL CASTING
lyttyaMetaluPage.description: QPart specializes in metal casting, handling orders ranging from the production of individual parts to mass production with subsequent machining. We ensure precision, quality, and durability of each product by utilizing modern technologies and high-quality materials.

listServices.description: Pressure casting: Suitable for complex-shaped parts with intricate contours. Products made with this method exhibit high precision, surface smoothness, and increased corrosion resistance.
Investment casting: Ensures the production of complex castings with high dimensional accuracy and weight precision. Suitable for working with any casting alloys.

lyttyaMetaluPage.peculiaritiesTitle: Features of the Metal Casting Process

listPeculiarities.description: High precision in part formation. Casting allows creating products with complex geometry and high detail. This is the ideal solution for mass production of identical parts.
Variety of materials. The process is suitable for working with a wide range of metals and alloys such as cast iron, aluminum, steel, copper, etc.
Minimal material waste. The use of modern casting technologies ensures high process efficiency and reduces waste.
Flexibility in production. The casting method is suitable for both small-batch and large-scale production, allowing for the manufacturing of both large and small parts.

listServicesContinuation.description: - Foam Casting - An ideal option for creating complex and custom models using expanded polystyrene.
- Lost Wax Casting (H.T.S.) - This method minimizes post-processing volumes due to the precision and conformity of parts to roughness requirements.
- Sand Casting - An economical method suitable for complex parts made from various alloys. Thanks to its low cost, it helps reduce the final product price.
- Shell Casting - A method involving pouring molten metal into reusable steel molds, allowing for high density and quality of products.

lyttyaMetaluPage.callToActionTop: Order reliable metal casting based on your drawings.
lyttyaMetaluPage.callToActionBottom: We will create the required products!

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.title: Manufacturing Components for Railway Infrastructure
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.description: QPart specializes in the production of high-quality components for railway infrastructure. We ensure the manufacturing of various parts that meet all modern safety and operational reliability standards. Our solutions are suitable for both upgrading existing systems and constructing new railway facilities.

listServices.description: Modern Equipment: CNC machines ensure high manufacturing precision.
Quality Control: All parts undergo testing to meet international standards.
Flexibility in Order Execution: We handle both large batches and single units.
Quick Turnaround Times: We provide fast production without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Wheelsets, brake discs, axles;
Bogie frame, fastening components, springs.
Rail fastenings, fishplates, base plates;
Tie bolts, anchor systems, bearing parts.
Signal poles, platforms, mounting assemblies;
Metal structures for bridges, tunnels, platforms.
Specialized products based on client drawings;
Parts with non-standard configurations for unique needs.

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.question: Need railway spare parts?
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.answer: We will manufacture them to your order, taking all requirements into account!

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.title: Production of Spare Parts for Agricultural Machinery
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.description: Our company specializes in creating high-quality spare parts for agricultural machinery, taking into account the needs of farmers and the specifics of modern farming equipment. We offer a wide range of components suitable for various types of machinery, ensuring uninterrupted operation even under the toughest conditions.Ensure your equipment with high-quality spare parts

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines ensures high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All parts are inspected for compliance with international standards.
Flexibility in order execution. We work with both large batches and single items.
Fast lead times. We provide prompt manufacturing without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Components for forage harvesting machinery: knives, shredders, shafts, chains that ensure uninterrupted operation of livestock equipment.
Parts for loaders and manipulators: hydraulic cylinders, mounts, hoses necessary for the reliable functioning of auxiliary equipment.
Specialized custom parts: we manufacture individual spare parts according to specific customer requests.

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.question: Looking for spare parts for agricultural machinery?
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.answer: Order from us, and we will manufacture them specifically for your machinery!
